title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Introducing the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, your ultimate audio companion for any occasion! These versatile speakers boast an impressive pairing capability, allowing you to connect up to 100 speakers simultaneously, creating an immersive surround sound experience like no other.

With a rugged IPX7 waterproof rating, these speakers are designed to withstand the elements, making them perfect for outdoor adventures, pool parties, or even a relaxing evening at home. Equipped with the latest Bluetooth V5.3 technology, you can enjoy seamless connectivity and high-quality audio streaming from your favorite devices.

Experience HiFi Stereo Sound, thanks to the dual speaker drivers and powerful amplifier module. The Raymate speakers are engineered to deliver balanced sound without distortion, ensuring crystal clear audio even at high volumes. The integrated turntable button provides easy control, so you can adjust the volume or switch tracks with a simple twist.

These portable speakers are designed with a golden ratio cylindrical body, available in purest colors, making them a stylish addition to any setting. The integrated structure offers protection against rain, dust, snow, and splashes, ensuring durability and longevity.

With a massive 3600mAh battery, these speakers offer an incredible 1100 minutes (more than 15 hours) of playtime, ensuring your music never stops. When it's time to recharge, the Type C charging port makes it quick and convenient.

Whether you're hosting a party, relaxing at home, or enjoying the great outdoors, the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are the perfect choice for an unparalleled audio experience. Experience the power of Raymate today!
